articles.title: Ind vs Pak, Asia Cup 2023: Will Ishan Kishan make way for KL Rahul? A look at India's predicted XI against Pakistan | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India's KL Rahul likely to replace Ishan Kishan as wicketkeeper batter in second match against Pakistan. Jasprit Bumrah and Axar Patel also expected to join the Indian XI.
articles.content: India and Pakistan will play their second match in this year's Asia Cup today after the first was washed out due to rain. While a confident Pakistan side have announced their squad for the upcoming c… [+1628 chars]
